field_descriptions.txid: ID of the repatriation transaction on the foreign chain.
field_descriptions.txts: Timestamp of the repatriation transaction on the foreign chain.
field_descriptions.sender_address: Sender address on the foreign chain.
field_descriptions.data: Data to be forwarded to the recipient.
field_descriptions.stake_on: The outcome to add a stake on, 'yes' or 'no'.
field_descriptions.withdraw: Withdraw from a claim, set to 1.
field_descriptions.foreign_address: Foreign address to transfer the coins to.
